author: Lynne K
title: The perfect hotel for my needs
text:
The location opposite 96th Street Station was fantastic. Given the snow and freezing conditions, I had underestimated how important an express major station would be.
The room was not as small as some reviews imply, had everything I needed and was very clean. I asked for a quiet room, and it was very quiet. Wifi worked well, and the little kitchen gave me all I needed. I wasn't very impressed with the diner on one side, but on the next corner was an excellent bakery and cafe. The pharmacy / supermarket next door was terrific. The laundry nearby did a great job.
But for me the best feature was the staff. As a mature aged woman landing from Australia with limited experience traveling, I asked some questions which must have seemed very silly. Every question was answered with care and excellent advice. Having friendly people at the desk 24/7 made me feel safe. Mike, in particular, did everything he could to be helpful.
Even if I had ample money for a far more expensive hotel, I would return to the Newton.
Room Tip: I asked for quiet and got it. I choose for my own bathroom. See more room tips
